name: VeganBoston
0:
”Alexa, ask Vegan Boston for restaurant”
”Alexa, ask Vegan Boston for restaurant in Cambridge”
”Alexa, ask Vegan Boston for restaurant in Salem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vegan boston
des: Get concise information on vegan restaurants in and around Boston. You can ask Vegan Boston for a 'restaurant' or a restaurant in a particular city by asking for 'restaurant in <city name>'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
